snippet: As a mobile version of Windows 10 awaits release, universal versions of some apps, including Twitter and Photoshop, have already been unveiled.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights apps for Microsoft's new Windows 10 operating system.
lead_paragraph: As a mobile version of Windows 10 awaits release, universal versions of some apps, including Twitter and Photoshop, have already been unveiled.

headline.print_headline: ‘Universal’ Apps for Windows 10, at Home in Many Gadgets
headline.main: Video Feature: ‘Universal’ Apps for Windows 10 That Call Many Gadgets Home
